#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

typedef long long ll;

using namespace std;

inline int test()
{
    ll p, c;
    scanf("%lld %lld",&p, &c);
    c++;
    ll n = p/c;
    ll mod = p%c;
    if (mod)
    {
        n++;
    }
    //if (c>p){printf("1\n"); return 0;}
    printf("%lld\n",n);

    return 0;
}

int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        test();
    }

    return 0;
}
